pageContext.claim: “These people have gone insane, and they're radical left, and you look at some of the things happening in these Democrat- run cities, which we could solve in two minutes. All they'd have to do is call us, right?...But all they have to do is call us. We'll be in there in two minutes, and we'll take care of the problem.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump frequently exaggerates the impact of his actions in response to protests. But the mayors of Minneapolis and Seattle said they acted without his help.
